law.catch_line: Any contract for printing for the State shall be made through or with the approval of the Secretary ...
law.text:
Any contract for printing for the State shall be made through or with the approval of the Secretary except for:
a contract for printing for the General Assembly and its staff agencies;
a contract for printing a record or brief for the Office of the Attorney General; and
a contract for printing of the Maryland Reports or the Maryland Appellate Reports.
